welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Acworth, the charming, historic city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Acworth has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cartersville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cartersville Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxury amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport houses all of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, security, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
